name: Jane
descriptions: Jane is one of Mr. House's Securitron "girls" found in the Lucky 38 penthouse in 2281.

Jane's neuro-computational matrix is a copy of a woman that Mr. House had known as "one of Mr. House's girls." Jane makes sure to keep Mr. House "entertained," even after giving up his physical needs.

Jane is a reference to the 1950s film star Jane Russell, who began her film career in a movie with Howard Hughes, the man upon who Robert House is based. In real life, Jane Russell was friends with Marilyn Monroe. A Securitron Marilyn was intended to appear in the game, as seen in the concept art and the Collector's Edition playing cards, but was cut from the final release.

topics.response_text: Ooh, suddenly I feel all tingly. And I find I've got a rocket launcher!
Aw, sugar, why'd you have to go make Mr. House mad? Now we've got to get all messy shooting you to little bits.

topics.topic_text: Can you tell me about Mr. House?
topics.response_text: Why, sugar, he's the maximum utmost! If it weren't for Mr. House, we wouldn't have this fabulous wonderland of New Vegas, would we?
This is the Lucky 38 Resort and Casino - or, it used to be. Mr. House has kept the place locked up tight for ages now, nobody comes in or out.

topics.topic_text: What kind of robots are you?
topics.response_text: Why I'm a RobCo PDQ-88b{Mark}Mk I Securitron, you silly goose! We're the finest in personal or civil robotic security on the market!
Not many people know this, but Mr. House is one of the world's biggest collectors of antique snow globes!

topics.topic_text: What can you tell me about New Vegas?
topics.response_text: Oh, there's lots of things to tell, I'm sure. There's the Three Families, the casinos, the other attractions - what would you like to know?
I'm Jane, one of Mr. House's girls. We keep him... entertained. We don't get many guests lately; perhaps we can entertain you as well.

topics.topic_text: Sounds like you're pretty fond of him.
topics.response_text: Well, of course I am, silly! Mr. House is just the smartest, most wonderful man there ever was!

topics.topic_text: I didn't realize robots could have such strong feelings about people.
topics.response_text: Sugar, I may be a robot on the outside, but on the inside, my neuro-computational matrix is an exact copy of Mr. House's favorite girl.

topics.topic_text: So you're... a copy of a dead woman? What exactly do you do for Mr. House?
topics.response_text: Mr. House has a lot of needs, sugar. I take care of all of them, and a lady doesn't kiss and tell.

topics.topic_text: I really don't want to think about that.
topics.response_text: Then maybe you shouldn't pry into a lady's particulars, hmm?

topics.topic_text: Tell me about the Three Families.
topics.response_text: They're just new money, sugar. They might pretend they're sophisticated, but between you and me, they're not far off from tribals.
Well, of course there used to be a lot more of them, but these days there are three open to the public: The Tops, the Ultra-Luxe, and Gomorrah.

topics.topic_text: Tell me about the other attractions.
topics.response_text: Well, let's see: the NCR has an embassy here, but why you'd want to go talk to a bunch of boring old politicians I surely don't know.
